Posts.Content: May 31, 2019 03:31PM Sofiejo wrote: so sorry to hear of your recent diagnosis. That was exactly me - 5 years ago now. I am doing fine and all that I went through is a faint memory. I used this site a lot for support and for answers to questions. I had a lumpectomy followed by radiation for 6 weeks. Almost done with Tamoxifen. I’m feeling great and so will you. God bless
Posts.Title: Just Diagnosed and very scared ik0106 Sofiejo
